docs.snippet: A push to overhaul criminal sentencing is prompting the early release of thousands of federal drug prisoners, including some whom prosecutors once described as threats to society, according to an Associated Press review of court records....
docs.lead_paragraph: A push to overhaul criminal sentencing is prompting the early release of thousands of federal drug prisoners, including some whom prosecutors once described as threats to society, according to an Associated Press review of court records.

headline.main: Drug Inmates With Long Rap Sheets Among Those Freed Early
headline.print_headline: Drug Inmates With Long Rap Sheets Among Those Freed Early

docs.snippet: The fifth season of Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk’s anthology series arrives, with murders, a musty Los Angeles setting and Lady Gaga....
docs.lead_paragraph: The fifth season of Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk’s anthology series arrives, with murders, a musty Los Angeles setting and Lady Gaga.
docs.abstract: Mike Hale reviews premiere of American Horror Story: Hotel, fifth season of FX series; Kathy Bates and Lady Gaga star.

headline.main: Review: ‘American Horror Story: Hotel,’ as Depraved as Ever
headline.print_headline: At a Deco Hotel, New Lost Souls and Carnage

docs.snippet: If the reorganization of the Central States Pension Fund ultimately proves successful, it could serve as a model for other retirement plans with seemingly intractable financial problems....
docs.lead_paragraph: If the reorganization of the Central States Pension Fund ultimately proves successful, it could serve as a model for other retirement plans with seemingly intractable financial problems.
docs.abstract: Central States Pension Fund, decades-old Teamsters pension fund, files for reorganization and sends letters to its more than 400,000 members asking to reduce payouts now to avoid collapse in next few years; if successful, reorganization could serve as model for other retirement plans that face financial problems.

headline.main: Teamsters’ Pension Fund Warns 400,000 of Cuts
headline.print_headline: Teamsters Pension Fund Warns 400,000 of Cuts

headline.main: Kenya Barris on ‘Black-ish,’ Shonda Rhimes and His Favorite Shows
